resources.name: Wiktenauer
resources.description: Collaborative website for collecting free to access manuscripts and translations relating to Historical European Martial Arts.

resources.name: Reinier van Noort
resources.description: A listing of works by Reinier van Noort, a teacher, researcher and practitioner of Historical European Martial Arts who has published a number of translations of historical manuals and books on the subject, focusing on Single Rapier from late 17th century German and the Netherlands, as well as Italian sidesword.

resources.name: Jherek Swanger
resources.description: A listing of works by Jherek Swanger, an interpreter and translator of historical treatises whose work focuses on 16th/17th century Italian swordplay, French small sword and Bolognese swordsmanship.
